sentences.english: It was a cold winter morning.
Everything was white from the snow!

sentences.german: Sie zog schnell ihre warme Jacke an.
sentences.english: She quickly put on her warm jacket.

sentences.german: Draußen baute sie einen großen Schneemann.
sentences.english: Outside she built a big snowman.

sentences.german: Der Schneemann hatte eine Karotte als Nase.
sentences.english: The snowman had a carrot for a nose.

sentences.german: Lisa gab ihm einen alten Hut.
sentences.english: Lisa gave him an old hat.

sentences.german: Ihr Bruder kam und sie spielten im Schnee.
sentences.english: Her brother came and they played in the snow.
